languages.text: {n}Идира улыбается — мягко, почти жалобно.{/n} "Не буду врать, {name}: нет. Возможно, никогда не приду. Но голоса случайные я больше не слушаю. И сама не зову никого оттуда... Нет, с этим покончено. После того, что {d|Encyclopedia:CompIdira_LeftAliveSoft}вы для меня сделали{/d}... я не могу подвести вас еще раз".

traits.locale_text: {n}Идира улыбается — мягко, почти жалобно.{/n} "Не буду врать, {name}: нет. Возможно, никогда не приду. Но голоса случайные я больше не слушаю. И сама не зову никого оттуда... Нет, с этим покончено. После того, что вы для меня сделали... я не могу подвести вас еще раз".

languages.text: {n}Idira smiles softly, almost piteously.{/n} "I'm not going to lie, {name}, I haven't. Maybe I never will. But I'm not hearing random voices anymore. And I haven't been calling anyone from the other side... No, all that's done with. After what you {d|Encyclopedia:CompIdira_LeftAliveSoft}did for me{/d}... I can't let you down again."
languages.original_text: {n}Идира улыбается — мягко, почти жалобно.{/n} "Не буду врать, {name}: нет. Возможно, никогда не приду. Но голоса случайные я больше не слушаю. И сама не зову никого оттуда... Нет, с этим покончено. После того, что {d|Encyclopedia:CompIdira_LeftAliveSoft}вы для меня сделали{/d}... я не могу подвести вас еще раз".

And I haven't been calling anyone from the other side... No, all that's done with. After what you did for me... I can't let you down again."

{n}Idira smiles softly, almost piteously.{/n} "I'm not going to lie, {name}, I haven't. Maybe I never will. But I'm not hearing random voices anymore. And I haven't been calling anyone from the other side... No, all that's done with. After what you did for me... I can't let you down again."

{n}Idira smiles softly, almost piteously.{/n} "I'm not going to lie, {name}, I haven't. Maybe I never will. But I'm not hearing random voices anymore. And I haven't been calling anyone from the other side... No, all that's done with. After what you did for me... I can't let you down again."

{n}Idira smiles softly, almost piteously.{/n} "I'm not going to lie, {name}, I haven't. Maybe I never will. But I'm not hearing random voices anymore. And I haven't been calling anyone from the other side... No, all that's done with. After what you {d|Encyclopedia:CompIdira_LeftAliveSoft}did for me{/d}... I can't let you down again."

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉轻轻地笑着，几乎是带着哀怨。{/n}“我不想撒谎，{name}。我没有，也许我永远都不会再恢复过来了。不过，我再也听不到那些莫名奇妙的声音了，也再也没呼唤过那边的任何人……不，这一切都结束了。{d|Encyclopedia:CompIdira_LeftAliveSoft}你为我做了这一切{/d}……我不能再让你失望了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira smiles softly, almost piteously.{/n} "I'm not going to lie, {name}, I haven't. Maybe I never will. But I'm not hearing random voices anymore. And I haven't been calling anyone from the other side... No, all that's done with. After what you {d|Encyclopedia:CompIdira_LeftAliveSoft}did for me{/d}... I can't let you down again."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉轻轻地笑着，几乎是带着哀怨。{/n}“我不想撒谎，{name}。我没有，也许我永远都不会再恢复过来了。不过，我再也听不到那些莫名奇妙的声音了，也再也没呼唤过那边的任何人……不，这一切都结束了。你为我做了这一切……我不能再让你失望了。”

languages.original_text: {n}Idira smiles softly, almost piteously.{/n} "I'm not going to lie, , I haven't. Maybe I never will. But I'm not hearing random voices anymore. And I haven't been calling anyone from the other side... No, all that's done with. After what you did for me... I can't let you down again."

languages.text: {n}Idira sonríe con amabilidad, casi con lástima.{/n} «No voy a mentir, {name}, la verdad es que no. Tal vez nunca lo haga. Pero ya no oigo voces sin sentido, y tampoco he estado llamando a nadie del otro lado... No, eso se acabó. Después de lo que {d|Encyclopedia:CompIdira_LeftAliveSoft}hizo por mí{/d}... no puedo volver a decepcionar{mf|le|la}».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira smiles softly, almost piteously.{/n} "I'm not going to lie, {name}, I haven't. Maybe I never will. But I'm not hearing random voices anymore. And I haven't been calling anyone from the other side... No, all that's done with. After what you {d|Encyclopedia:CompIdira_LeftAliveSoft}did for me{/d}... I can't let you down again."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira sonríe con amabilidad, casi con lástima.{/n} «No voy a mentir, {name}, la verdad es que no. Tal vez nunca lo haga. Pero ya no oigo voces sin sentido, y tampoco he estado llamando a nadie del otro lado... No, eso se acabó. Después de lo que hizo por mí... no puedo volver a decepcionar{mf|le|la}».

languages.text: {n}イディラは柔らかく、ほとんど哀しそうに微笑んだ。{/n}「嘘をつくつもりはないわ{name}、たぶんこれからも。でも、無秩序な声はもう聞こえない。向こう側から誰かを呼ぶこともない…もう終わったことなの。{d|Encyclopedia:CompIdira_LeftAliveSoft}あなたがしてくれたこと{/d}を思えば…失望させるわけにはいかないわ」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira smiles softly, almost piteously.{/n} "I'm not going to lie, {name}, I haven't. Maybe I never will. But I'm not hearing random voices anymore. And I haven't been calling anyone from the other side... No, all that's done with. After what you {d|Encyclopedia:CompIdira_LeftAliveSoft}did for me{/d}... I can't let you down again."

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは柔らかく、ほとんど哀しそうに微笑んだ。{/n}「嘘をつくつもりはないわ、{name}。たぶんこれからも。でも、無秩序な声はもう聞こえない。向こう側から誰かを呼ぶこともない…もう終わったことなの。あなたがしてくれたことを思えば…失望させるわけにはいかないわ」

languages.text: {n}Idira lächelt sanft, fast kläglich.{/n} "Ich will ganz ehrlich sein, {name}, nein. Vielleicht wird das nie geschehen. Doch ich höre keine willkürlichen Stimmen mehr. Und ich rufe niemanden mehr von der anderen Seite ... Nein, das ist alles Vergangenheit. Nach dem, was Ihr {d|Encyclopedia:CompIdira_LeftAliveSoft}für mich getan{/d} habt ... kann ich euch nicht erneut enttäuschen."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira smiles softly, almost piteously.{/n} "I'm not going to lie, {name}, I haven't. Maybe I never will. But I'm not hearing random voices anymore. And I haven't been calling anyone from the other side... No, all that's done with. After what you {d|Encyclopedia:CompIdira_LeftAliveSoft}did for me{/d}... I can't let you down again."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira lächelt sanft, fast kläglich.{/n} "Ich will ganz ehrlich sein, {name}, nein. Vielleicht wird das nie geschehen. Doch ich höre keine willkürlichen Stimmen mehr. Und ich rufe niemanden mehr von der anderen Seite ... Nein, das ist alles Vergangenheit. Nach dem, was Ihr für mich getan habt ... kann ich euch nicht erneut enttäuschen."

languages.text: {n}Idira affiche un léger sourire, mais vous la sentez dépitée.{/n} « Je ne vais pas vous mentir, {name} : non, je ne m'en suis pas encore remise. Peut-être que je n'y arriverai jamais. Mais au moins, je n'entends plus de voix et je n'ai pas refait appel à ceux de l'autre côté... Non, tout ça, c'est fini. Après ce que vous avez {d|Encyclopedia:CompIdira_LeftAliveSoft}fait pour moi{/d}... je ne veux plus jamais vous décevoir. »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira smiles softly, almost piteously.{/n} "I'm not going to lie, {name}, I haven't. Maybe I never will. But I'm not hearing random voices anymore. And I haven't been calling anyone from the other side... No, all that's done with. After what you {d|Encyclopedia:CompIdira_LeftAliveSoft}did for me{/d}... I can't let you down again."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira affiche un léger sourire, mais vous la sentez dépitée.{/n} « Je ne vais pas vous mentir, {name} : non, je ne m'en suis pas encore remise. Peut-être que je n'y arriverai jamais. Mais au moins, je n'entends plus de voix et je n'ai pas refait appel à ceux de l'autre côté... Non, tout ça, c'est fini. Après ce que vous avez fait pour moi... je ne veux plus jamais vous décevoir. »

languages.text: {n}İdira hafifçe gülümsüyor. Gülümsemesi âdeta yürekleri parçalıyor.{/n} "Yalan söyleyecek değilim {name}, kendime pek gelemedim. Belki de hiç gelemem. Ancak artık rastgele sesler duymuyorum. Öteki taraftan kimseyi çağırdığım da yok. O sayfa kapandı. {d|Encyclopedia:CompIdira_LeftAliveSoft}Benim için yaptıklarından{/d} sonra... Seni tekrar yarı yolda bırakamam."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira smiles softly, almost piteously.{/n} "I'm not going to lie, {name}, I haven't. Maybe I never will. But I'm not hearing random voices anymore. And I haven't been calling anyone from the other side... No, all that's done with. After what you {d|Encyclopedia:CompIdira_LeftAliveSoft}did for me{/d}... I can't let you down again."

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira hafifçe gülümsüyor. Gülümsemesi âdeta yürekleri parçalıyor.{/n} "Yalan söyleyecek değilim {name}, kendime pek gelemedim. Belki de hiç gelemem. Ancak duyduklarım artık rastgele sesler değil. Öteki taraftan kimseyi çağırdığım da yok. O sayfa kapandı. Benim için yaptıklarından sonra... Seni tekrar yarı yolda bırakamam."

{n}İdira hafifçe gülümsüyor. Gülümsemesi âdeta yürekleri parçalıyor.{/n} "Yalan söyleyecek değilim {name}, kendime pek gelemedim. Belki de hiç gelemem. Ancak duyduklarım artık rastgele sesler değil. Öteki taraftan kimseyi çağırdığım da yok. O sayfa kapandı. Benim için yaptıklarından sonra... Seni tekrar yarı yolda bırakamam."
